name: Veligandu Island Resort and Spa

reviews.stay_parameters: Stayed March 2008, traveled as a couple
reviews.text: Many of the recent reviews tell what a wonderful beautiful island Veligandu is. How fabulous the food is and how friendly the staff are. This is going to be no different!
reviews.title: Veli nice indeed

reviews.stay_parameters: Stayed February 2008, traveled as a couple
reviews.text: We had booked one of the new Jacuzzi Water Villas, for 10 nights over the Easter holidays. We booked through Hayes and Jarvis direct (always a painless experience). We travelled via Qatar airways (quite good).
reviews.title: Great Island!

reviews.stay_parameters: Stayed February 2008, traveled as a couple
reviews.text: We did have one fairly significant hiccup though which you should be aware of. When we arrived we were told that our room was unavailable until the following day. This applied to 4 other couples arriving on the same day, so we were not singled out for this at least!
reviews.title: WOW - Fantastic!

reviews.stay_parameters: Stayed January 2008, traveled as a couple
reviews.text: We were given one of the old pre-refurbished beach villas for our first night. Not a great start. To be fair to the management however, they were very apologetic, they give us the difference in price ($162) for the different room, a free bottle of wine and a candlelit dinner for 2 from the A la Carte restaurant. We were happy with the compensation offered, though what else could we have done at the time? I don't think that this can happen too often, as the waiters and bar staff looked at me as if I had my wires crossed when I quoted our room number to them on our first night.
reviews.title: Perfect chilled out holiday

reviews.stay_parameters: Stayed February 2008, traveled as a couple
reviews.text: Apart from this, Veligandu is an absolute treasure. The refurb. is virtually complete now, some planting and on-going maintenance is evident but quite un obtrusive.
reviews.title: Refurbished Veli

likes.disliked: — was not a new jwv as we had booked

reviews.stay_parameters: Stayed March 2008, traveled as a couple
reviews.text: There is little to say other than this place is perfect, the sea, sand, food and if your lucky the water accomodation is amazing. Massive praise has to go the the chef. We had an amazing time and will return!!!!
reviews.title: Perfect

reviews.stay_parameters: Stayed June 2008, traveled as a couple
reviews.text: We went to Veligandu for our honeymoon at the end of June for two weeks. It was a last minute decision to have a honeymoon due to the expense of the wedding, but thank goodness we did. We can't say enough about Veligandu, the people, the food, the accommodation, the weather, the snorkeling, the turquoise waters, just everything surpassed our expectations.
reviews.title: Paradise on earth

likes.liked: — location, right on the beach, quiet and peaceful

reviews.stay_parameters: Stayed April 2008, traveled as a couple
reviews.text: As we started our descent to Male airport we were totally amazed at all the Atolls, we'd never seen anything like it before. Both my husband and I are well traveled but have never been anywhere so idyllic and beautiful. When we were told that the island was very small with two restaurants and one bar we wondered what on earth we were going to do for two weeks! Well we needed have been worried for one minute. The wildlife in itself is fascinating, my husband was mesmerized by the hermit crabs and the fruit bats were just wonderful.
reviews.title: Fabulous Veligandu

reviews.stay_parameters: Stayed June 2008, traveled as a couple
reviews.text: We stayed in a beach jacuzzi villa, which was the suggestion of our Thomson rep (who by the way was fantastic, thanks Steve from Telford!) and he made a great choice for us. The weather was quite perfect (unusual for this time of the year) although we did have one stormy night, which unnerved some friends we had met who were staying in a water villa, because of the water bashing on the underneath of the villa, we didn't hear a thing tucked away sheltered by the trees on the beach, so were shocked to hear some people hadn't slept!
reviews.title: A Little Piece of Heaven

likes.liked: — Excellent Views, Cleanliness and very private

reviews.stay_parameters: Stayed July 2008, traveled as a couple
reviews.text: We hope to go to Veli again maybe in a couple of years, we've started saving the pennies already!
reviews.title: Wonderful holiday
Honeymoon in Veli
reviews.text: Just come back from our honeymoon in Veli and all I can say is am I glad we booked to go there...it was perfect!

reviews.stay_parameters: Stayed April 2008, traveled as a couple
reviews.text: I have never seen beautiful scenery like it, I was in awe of Veli every time I left our heavenly jacuzzi water villa. How amazing watching the sharks swimming under our villa and swimming with turtles and eagle rays amongst an abundance of other sea life that I have no idea the name of! It was wonderful to wake up and the first thing you see is the lagoon that just begs to be swam in....all day!
reviews.title: Paradise- Knocks the socks off Mauritus!

reviews.text: The island has a fantastic restaurant and a great bar, even the swimming pool was lovely.
reviews.title: Incredible Resort

reviews.stay_parameters: Stayed April 2008, traveled as a couple
reviews.text: We had a candlelit meal on the beach as part compensation for our chosen villa not being available the first night (this seems to be a common theme) and again it was perfect. Food delicious!
reviews.title: Beautiful Island - It really is Paradise

reviews.stay_parameters: Stayed April 2008, traveled as a couple
reviews.text: I loved Veli and as sure as night follows day you will love it too.
reviews.title: Veligandu - 'A piece of heaven on earth'

likes.liked: — Clean, Modern, Private - An excellent location

reviews.stay_parameters: Stayed June 2008, traveled as a couple
reviews.text: We went to Veligandu for 2 weeks June 08 for our honeymoon. We absolutely loved it and are fully considering going back.
reviews.title: Having withdrawal

reviews.stay_parameters: Stayed June 2008, traveled as a couple
reviews.text: We stayed in an older water villa (with no jacuzzi) and the room was spotless, was cleaned twice a day and had a tv/dvd player and sound system. The room was massive aswell as the bathroom.
reviews.title: We loved it

reviews.stay_parameters: Stayed June 2008, traveled as a couple
reviews.text: The dhonvelli restaurant was buffet style and we always ended up with plates piled high. Even though I'm quite a picky eater, There was only one evening where I struggled but I still ended up stuffed by just eating a lot of the same thing. The food was great and the desserts delicious.
reviews.title: Fabulous

likes.disliked: — Could do with some shade outside villas

reviews.text: We had a beach dinner in the Madivaru a la carte restaurant which isn't included in the AI. The menu is very select but what we had was great. There was 2 waiters and a chef
reviews.title: Beautiful site, just need to iron out a few creases....

reviews.stay_parameters: Stayed May 2008, traveled as a couple
reviews.text: The Thundi bar was very comfortable and the staff remember what you like to drink and are so very friendly. There is evening entertainment such as quizes, disco, crab racing and cultural dancing, but it is quite low key so if you're looking for something to keep you occupied for hours on end its maybe not the place for you.
reviews.title: Fantastic, surpassed all expectations. Look no further!!!

likes.disliked: — We're struggling but probably on this one but probably that AI isn't completely AI.

aka: Veligandu Island Hotel North Ari Atoll
description: Veligandu Island Resort, surrounded by a beautiful lagoon and long stretches of white, sandy beach, is the only resort on the island of Veligandu, in North Ari Atoll. Transfers are by seaplane, a scenic 15 minute ride from/to the Ibrahim Nasir International Airport. 81 Rooms, including 54 Jacuzzi Water Villas, 10 Water Villas and 10 Jacuzzi Beach Villas.
